description: Led the migration of legacy SPAs to Next.js 14, improving Core Web Vitals by 40%.
Architected a reusable component library consumed by 5+ internal teams.
Mentored junior developers and established code review standards.
Developed high-performance map rendering engine using WebGL and Rust.
Optimized raster processing pipelines for satellite imagery analysis.
Implemented OGC standards compliant API services.
